most_active_tickets.title: Pieces os doesn't launch at all for past week. Can't use pieces at all

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Model Download Failures
common_issues.description: Users report Pieces OS failing to launch or download models.  Issues potentially stem from software versions, requiring updates to Pieces OS or the desktop application.  Reinstallation attempts haven't consistently resolved the problems.  The Pieces team is actively investigating these issues.

related_issues.title: Models Download Fail
related_issues.text:
Models Download Fail
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'm not able to download any of the models for ollama.
[log-02022025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18631166/log-02022025.txt)

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8e93857a-de7e-4e62-b3d0-c6a68b48631e
## GitHub Issue Summary: Ollama Installation Issue

**Key Points:**
* Surya Sengupta reported an issue with Ollama installation not working after one day.
* Support bot provided some initial guidance and suggested relevant resources.
* Brian from the Pieces team recommended updating to OS 11.1.0 for potential stability improvements.

**Identified Problem:** Ollama installation fails or stops working shortly after installation.

**Proposed/Implemented Solution:**
* Update Pieces OS to version 11.1.0.

**Outcome:**
* The issue seemed resolved after updating to OS 11.1.0 but reoccurred after a day, even after a clean reinstall. 
* User provided additional information through a log file for further troubleshooting.

**Current Status:** Open. The Pieces team continues to investigate and address the issue.

related_issues.title: Pieces os doesn't launch at all for past week. Can't use pieces at all
related_issues.text:
Pieces os doesn't launch at all for past week. Can't use pieces at all
### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

For the past week, anytime that I launch pieces I see this: 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/61f18fb6-8846-46d8-8747-5c415fd2e82d)

Pieces OS just doesn't open, no matter what.

I tried to reinstall everything, but also no progress.

How to fix it? (Also to mention, Pieces desktop app is in Early Access program, but I don't know if this information is useful)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Issue:** GetReal444 reported an issue with Pieces on February 10, 2025.

**Key Points:**

* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the relevant Pieces team member.
* GetReal444 will receive a follow-up within 24 hours.
* Similar issues have been reported previously:
    * Unable to launch Pieces Windows desktop version
    * Pieces OS won't run
    * Not working
* Resources provided to GetReal444:
    * Existing Issues on GitHub
    * Pieces documentation
    * Pieces YouTube channel

**Problems Identified:**

* The exact nature of the problem GetReal444 is experiencing is unclear.
* It is possible that the issue is related to one of the previously reported problems.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The Pieces team will investigate the issue and provide a follow-up to GetReal444.
* GetReal444 is encouraged to consult the provided resources for potential solutions.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is currently being investigated by the Pieces team.
* The outcome is unknown at this time.

**Note:** The conversation only provides limited information. For a more comprehensive understanding of the issue and its resolution, further investigation is required.

recommendations: Investigate the recurring issue of Pieces OS failing to launch or download models, as reported in tickets #608 and #620.
Provide users with clear and consistent guidance on troubleshooting steps for Pieces OS and Model Download Failures, including potential workarounds while a permanent solution is being developed.
Consider prioritizing bug fixes and software updates related to Pieces OS and model downloads to address the root cause of these common issues.
Monitor the effectiveness of implemented solutions and update support documentation and communication channels accordingly to reflect the latest findings and resolutions.
